title: Riposte
body:
{{champion:99}}: FINAL SPARK!
"BOZEEM"
{{champion:114}}: *"Riposte*"
{{champion:99}}: What...but how did you do that?
{{champion:114}}: Do what?
{{champion:99}}: Dodge light.
{{champion:114}}: Oh, I didn't dodge it I parried it.
{{champion:99}}: How?
{{champion:114}}: With my sword.
{{champion:99}}: Swords can't do that!
{{champion:114}}: Sure they can, you just have to polish your weapon enough.
{{champion:86}}: Hey sis, hello Fiora.  What are you both up to?
{{champion:114}}: Oh, I was just explaining to Lux that I can reflect light with my sword.
{{champion:99}}: Wait, what?
{{champion:86}}: Oh, yeah sure you can.  I'm surprised you didn't know that Lux.  I use my sword as a mirror all the time.
{{champion:99}}: No, no you can't parry light like that.
{{champion:114}} {{champion:86}}: Yes you can, you just have to polish your weapon enough.
{{champion:24}}: Really any weapon can it just takes a lot of polish.
{{champion:86}}: Oh, I didn't see you there Jax.  Why are you here?
{{champion:24}}: I was just being the judge to their duel.
{{champion:99}}: You cannot just parry light like that and you certainly can't do it with a lamp.
{{champion:24}}: Challenge accepted.  Go ahead try and shoot me.
{{champion:99}}: If it will stop this ridiculous argument.  FINAL SPARK!
"BOZEEM"
{{champion:24}}: *"Riposte*"
{{champion:99}}: AAAAAAAH, how did you do that?
{{champion:24}}: I just put a lot of lamp polish on my lamp and then you swing it fast.
{{champion:99}}: No...well not just that, how did you even do that?  That is one of Fiora's skills.
{{champion:24}}: What riposte?  Any swordsman "Looks at Fiora" or swordswoman can do it.  It's a pretty basic technique.
{{champion:86}}: Yeah, I can do it too.
{{champion:99}}: But...but YOU'RE RIPOSTING LIGHT!
{{champion:86}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:24}}: You just have to polish your weapon enough.
{{champion:99}}: NO, YOU CAN'T JUST POLISH A WEAPON AND PARRY LIGHT!
{{champion:164}}: What is all this shouting for?
{{champion:114}}: Lux seems to think we can't parry light if we polish our weapons.
{{champion:164}}: Oh, well of course you can.  I keep my legs very shiny and polished just for those kind of occasions.
{{champion:99}}: FINAL SPARK!
{{champion:164}}: *"Riposte*"
"BOZEEM"
{{champion:99}}: but...but...but...
{{champion:164}}: Really darling, you shouldn't just announce your attack like that.  It really gives us a good opportunity to parry your light beam.
{{champion:114}}: Oh, for certain.  It makes it so easy to time our parries.
{{champion:86}}: I can probably parry it too.
{{champion:44}}: Hey guys, whats up?
{{champion:24}}: Lux is having trouble accepting that light can be parried by our weapons.
{{champion:44}}: Oh, the polish right?
{{champion:24}}: Yeah.
{{champion:44}}:  Well, it could be worse Lux.
{{champion:99}}: ?
{{champion:44}}: Try and hit me.
{{champion:99}}: Whatever.....Final Spark.
"BOZEEM"
{{champion:44}}: See.
{{champion:99}}: You...you didn't do anything.  My spell...it had no effect.
{{champion:44}}: I know.  I've covered my body with polish.  I don't need to parry.
{{champion:99}}: he did....but an.....if then.... "wonders off muttering to herself"
{{champion:86}}: ....I should probably umm...watch her.
{{champion:24}}: Science is a cruel mistress.  Imagine if I had a real mirror.
